If you go to the South Eastern area there are monsters known as {c1}South Eastern Wind Harpy{/c}. These monsters often carry this {c3}Gold Magic Silk{/c}. If you get her these items, she will bestow a great gift. Good luck and may fate smile upon you.
MsgIncomplete: I apologize for not giving you more of a reward.

MsgSummary: Take at least 5 {c3}Spirit Lost{/c} to {c2}Chris Celina{/c}.
MsgComplete: Omigawdess! You're so capable at this, and the work is beyond my expectations... and same with you.
MsgResponse1: Omigawdess! You're so capable at this, and the work is beyond my expectations... and same with you.
MsgIncomplete: Don't fail me Mr. Strong and Dependable! Teehee!

MsgSummary: Be rewarded by {c2}Chris Celina{/c}
MsgComplete: I should have asked you to come with me, ack this thing weighed a ton! Phew... Oh... my arms. Pick one from here. I'll see you sometime soon, kay?<Reward for fighter and defender><Reward for archer and ranger><Reward for mage and priest>
MsgTake:
Pretty good there hot stuff! Wasn't expecting these kind of results. Hmm... Y'know, I was considering using you as a guinea pig to test the toxic properties of my latest perfumes. Haha, I'm just kidding!
I'm in the middle of something so I don't have your reward ready. I'll go get the things I promised so talk to me later.

MsgSummary: Deliver the letter of {c2}Chris Celina{/c} to {c2}Cyrus Bearwolf{/c} and be rewarded.
MsgTake: Wow... This is a beyond my expectations. You totally deserve a great reward... Actually, I did some research on you. I found out you did some fantastic things. Commander {c2}Cyrus Bearwolf{/c} also said some good things about you. It's the first time I've seen him react that way. So, like he wants you to fight for him... Maybe the Commander feels bad from just giving you a tip that I pay well. So I told him that, like I suggested whether an item would do. So, here is the letter for the commander. I have recommended a few items that would seriously be you. You just have to collect them later. Till next time!
MsgIncomplete: Haha... I couldn't care less if you're a man or a woman. If you stayed any longer, I would never have let you go.

MsgSummary: Deliver {c3}Five Commandments{/c} to {c2}Balt Randolph{/c} at Huigronn Castle and be rewarded.
MsgComplete:
*hic* Who are you? *hic* Why are you here holding that... *hic*
{c5}(Good... I'm glad I brought it.){/c}
MsgTake:
{c5}I opened the crumpled paper... `Five commandments to remember'. 
1.	Don't drink- A lack of self control harms others.
2.	Don't try to drown your sorrows- It never solves anything.
3.	Care for your body- You do no favors to yourself by not being fit and lethargic.
4.	Don't rely on drinking- Drinking gives a brief reprieve but slides you down deeper in the long run.
5.	Never drink at work. Remember that time you let loose those dragons the traveling circus brought to the castle? Don't let that happen again.
. What's all this? It's all about drinking. The lower part of the paper is signed ` From the chief{/c}} to {c2}Balt Randolph{/c}{c5}'. He must drink like an Undine if his boss wrote him such a thing. If I don't take this paper to that old man... He'll never abstain from drinking. I better get this to him, fast.{/c}

MsgSummary: Capture at least 15 {c1}Clean Water Frog{/c}s and report to {c2}Balt Randolph{/c}.
MsgComplete:
Oh no.. What is this... *hic* did I tell you to catch 15? *hic* You... *hic* lazy no-good kid!
{c5}(I feel pretty bad about this... whatever I did wrong that is.){/c}
MsgResponse1:
Oh dear... What is this? *hic* who told you to catch so many? *hic* Though they are scumbags... *hic* You shouldn't just in-enact genocide! *hic*
{c5}(Maybe I did overdo it a little...){/c}

MsgSummary: Take 5 {c3}Magic Alchemy Powder{/c}s to {c2}Balt Randolph{/c}. {c3}Magic Alchemy Powder{/c} can be obtained from a {c1}West Wind Harpy{/c}.
MsgComplete: My word. Thank you... thank you so much. I got these from an old war buddy. I don't know whether he's alive or dead, he never came back for it. Choose whatever suits you. *hic* Never been sober for a while. Thanks. If you have anything to come by sometime. I'll be your companion to chat with. *hic* <Reward for fighter and defender><Reward for archer and ranger><Reward for mage and priest>
MsgTake:
Drinking is... *hic* It's life. *hic* We are always afraid of the unknown... What could I do without a drink? *hic* For me... I like my job. The chief of the castle guard takes good care of me.. Why am I always drunk in a beautiful place like this? *hic* At first I fought on the front line as a soldier. However, all my friends back then are now dead... It's just me. *hic* I have no one around to share the glory days... I just live to keep wandering silent heroes with spiky hair away from the warehouse... *hic*... I'm just not the man I used to be back then.

Just guarding the warehouses and getting drunk... *hic* Family? I have none... My adopted daughter.. I lost her when the Union of Fury attacked the castle... *hic* I have failed as a father. *hic* Hey, you! Are you listening? Are you? I bet you just want me to get to the point by now... *hic*
Do me a favor.. I.. I want to quit drinking. Now... I want to live as castle guard Balt Randolph rather than a drunk old man. I have to give up drinking. I owe the chief that much. So.. Can you bring me some {c3}Magic Alchemy Powder{/c}? It's used for alchemy and I think I can give up drinking just by taking it.
{c5}(.Alright, I'll get it for you.){/c}
Heheh... How can I thank you?
MsgIncomplete: Hhh... I'd have love to have you as my own kid.

MsgSummary: Take at least 10 {c3}Magic Alchemy Powder{/c} to {c2}Balt Randolph{/c}. {c3}Magic Alchemy Powder{/c} can be obtained from {c1}West Wind Harpy{/c}.
MsgComplete: Thank you... You made me feel sober.
MsgResponse1: Thank you. You made me feel sober. Hic!
MsgTake:
Drinking is... *hic* It's life. *hic* We are always afraid of the unknown... What could I do without a drink? *hic* For me... I like my job. The chief of the castle guard takes good care of me.. Why am I always drunk in a beautiful place like this? *hic* At first I fought on the front line as a soldier. However, all my friends back then are now dead... It's just me. *hic* I have no one around to share the glory days... I just live to keep wandering silent heroes with spiky hair away from the warehouse... *hic*... I'm just not the man I used to be back then.

Just guarding the warehouses and getting drunk... *hic* Family? I have none... My adopted daughter.. I lost her when the Union of Fury attacked the castle... *hic* I have failed as a father. *hic* Hey, you! Are you listening? Are you? I bet you just want me to get to the point by now... *hic*
Do me a favor.. I.. I want to quit drinking. Now... I want to live as castle guard Balt Randolph rather than a drunk old man. I have to give up drinking. I owe the chief that much. So.. Can you bring me some {c3}Magic Alchemy Powder{/c}? It's used for alchemy and I think I can give up drinking just by taking it.
{c5}(.Alright, I'll get it for you.){/c}
Heheh... How can I thank you?
MsgIncomplete: Hhh... I'd have love to have you as my own kid.

MsgSummary: Be rewarded by {c2}Balt Randolph{/c}.
MsgComplete: *hic*... Look here. I cared for it and it still shines so bright! *hic* Choose your reward from this selection *hic* hahaha. Thanks and farewell! ~<Reward for fighter and defender><Reward for Archers and Rangers><Reward for mage and priest>

MsgSummary: Get {c3}Flowers for Daughter{/c} and place them on the {c2}Daughter's Grave{/c}.
MsgComplete:
{c5} The grass was mown well. He was always drunk but he cared for his daughter's grave. He called himself foolish. But he could have been the most considerate father. You lay the flowers... A bag is on the side of the grave with a letter tucked inside. 
`To my helpful soldier.. This is to show my appreciation for your help... I wanted to say thanks in person but. I wanted you to visit my daughter. You are the one who got me out of that foolish life. Pick any item that would suit you... Thank you.. We'll talk about our lives when we meet next time, this time clean and sober.' 
The old man seemed to be just a sorry drunkard but.. He seems to be a considerate person. Did the chief of the castle guard get him to guard the warehouse due to his true self? I suppose his daughter must have been a lucky person to have a father like him.{/c}
<Reward for fighter and defender><Reward for archer and ranger><Reward for mage and priest>
MsgTake:
This is more than enough. It's beyond my expectation... *hic* Waddayaknow, I'm still drunk. Guess I'm getting too dang old. *hic* About five years ago, the kid I lost... She died about five years back. The Union of Fury attacked the castle and my daughter and I were there at the time. We were afraid, we even had an escape plan. However, one of the human soldiers used my daughter as a shield. My daughter got shot by the enemy's arrow instead of that sorry sack who called himself soldier. I cried my heart out once I escaped the attack...
The Union of Fury soldiers and the one who took my daughter's life for his, I took out that platoon and did the work they missed. However... This could be what's just in my mind... I hope they don't regret my actions. Haha.. Maybe I'm foolish... Tee~haha~hic~ I must give up drinking. I feel ashamed for myself when I think of my daughter watching me from above. You... will you put this flower on my daughter's grave? I have to go someday but... how could I with five years of being piss drunk? So ashamed. Say, when I give up drinking... I want to put some flowers down there myself.
{c5}(I understand...){/c}
Thank you.. Can you tell my daughter that I'm sorry? Well then, I gotta go. Have lots to do to stop drinking with those things you got me. Thank you.
MsgIncomplete: Heh, Drunkard Balt Randolph... They'll stop calling me that. Heh... Damn! Why can't you get cold you cheap hooch?!

MsgSummary: Eliminate at least 15 {c1}War Edge Orc Security{/c} and inform {c2}Bill Blue Mountain{/c}.
MsgComplete: Ah.. Thanks.. This will do. Those scumbags.. They realized their serious situation.
MsgResponse1: They are afraid! Thanks. With this.. They would never think of attacking humans for some time.
MsgTake: Wh-who are you?! You don't look like an average civilian. Dammit... my leg is pretty torn up. Those {c1}War Edge Orc Security{/c} guys are getting ready to enter Huigronn. I have to stop them... damn! They roughed me up bad. Someone has to stop them... Hey, you! You look like you've taken out an army or two. Could you stop them? Eliminating about 15 of them should get em to back off. Do me this favor... many innocent people will die if those Orcs get in. We can't let that happen.
MsgIncomplete: Dammit... the bleeding won't stop. If only my leg was ok I could do this on my own.

MsgSummary: Get rewarded by {c2}Bill Blue Mountain{/c}.
MsgComplete:
Here's some weapons and armor. Choose from the following, but make it quick. I have get moving... Phew..
{c5}(Are you OK?){/c}
Don't worry about me, I'm fine alright! Now pick something before I leave. 
<Reward for fighter and defender><Reward for Archers and Rangers><Reward for mage and priest>

MsgSummary: Take at least 10 {c3}Magic Iron Powder{/c}s to Bill. {c3}Magic Iron Powder{/c} can be obtained from the {c1}War Edge Orc Archer{/c} and the {c1}War Edge Orc Security{/c}.
MsgComplete: Hmm... It's not enough but maybe... I can perform first aid. Hey, you! ..*grumbles*... Thanks.
MsgResponse1: Well.. This would be enough to cure. Hey, are you tired?
MsgIncomplete: Phew... I hate getting help from others. dammit.

MsgSummary: Be rewarded by {c2}Bill Blue Mountain{/c}.
MsgComplete:
These are the items I got back in the army. Anyway, you can choose from these. Thank you. Perhaps we'll meet again if fate wills it. 
<Reward for Fighters and Defenders><Reward for Archers and Rangers><Reward for Mage and Priests>
MsgTake:
With this first aid.. I'll be able to walk without much problems. Say, thank you so much. 
Just look at me... I talked too much while sitting in a place for a long time. My leg is asleep. Now, for your reward. Can you bring me that bag? Standing is still a little tricky here. 
{c5}(The luggage is heavy. How can he carry the luggage to that rickety bridge? I'm worried.){/c}
Thank you. I'll take out the item to give you... Can we talk in a moment?

MsgSummary: Seek {c2}Balt Randolph{/c}, the storage guard at Huigronn and tell him the story of {c2}Bill Blue Mountain{/c}.
MsgComplete: Well Hello old friend! It's been a long time.. Did you like my items? Those things I took still aren't working like I thought. Oh well... So what can I do for you?
MsgTake:
I can walk with no problems since you brought me that stuff. Thank you so much. Are you leaving? I usually head off where no one has gone before, you have given me a great deal of assistance... I wonder if I'm getting too old for this?
{c5}(By looking at how you applied your field dressings... you must be a soldier but why are you here?){/c}
Can't keep anything from you, eh? Yeah, I was one of the good soldiers fighting the good fight for Huigronn. However.. that's the past. before a great sin was committed. I have taken the most precious and irreplaceable thing from a man... I know I won't be forgiven. I couldn't longer stay in one place after seeing that man enraged... I could not talk to anyone about it. I wanted forgiveness. 
{c5}(What happened!? Can you tell me?){/c}
You? Haha.. You seem to be a pretty good fella. You know.. haha.. it's funny.. How could I tell you after all you did for me? Okay... It was five years ago. As I have told you a while ago, I was fighting for Huigronn. I had no fear. I was one of those `Come on, hit me with your best shot' type of person. However, five years ago... things happened. It was a day filled with crowding, screaming, panicking people. The guard next to me started to shout `The Union of Fury has attacked'. Before he ever finished that sentence, a javelin pierced through his heart. I was always ready for combat but after seeing my friend die like that in an instant, I could not move. 
By the time the enemy got to our castle, I was busy cutting down foe after foe. It was then, one of the Union of Fury assassins found me and notched back an arrow. Then... I took a girl who turned the corner, using her as a shield to protect my sorry skin... After that, I saw a quick blur rush the Furies and I was knocked out. When I came to, I awoke beside the enemy, necks broken. I saw an old man crying with that same girl who I killed resting gently in his arms. I regretted being alive. I could not die and I ran before he saw me. I was a coward... I left the army. Everything felt so empty. In a week, I destroyed what I had built all my life. I suffered nightmares every night. I thought the way for redemption is to look for a place to die. That's why I'm wandering the world, giving the sorry excuse of "helping others"... But you know what? It's tough to just lie down and die for a soldier like me... See, so far I'm alive. Haha... dammit, why am I telling this story near that castle? 
I haven't thanked you right. Hmm... I think'll give you some potent armor I used back in my army days... Tell the storage guard at Huigronn to get the armor from my storage and bring me the luggage. It's nearby so it shouldn't take too long.
MsgIncomplete: Get going... I'll be fine. I'm always fine...

MsgSummary: Deliver the message given by {c2}Balt Randolph{/c} to {c2}Bill Blue Mountain{/c}.
MsgComplete:
How could.. How could Huigronn's storage guard be that same man... Is that really true? He forgives me?
{c5}(Bill cried for a long time. I could only just watch){/c}
How could I.. How could I.. A soldier shouldn't be this disgraceful. Sorry.. I can't stop crying. Huh, What a strange day. My sins have been taken away after stewing in my soul for five years. However... I'm not completely redeemed. He might have forgiven, yet I cannot forgive myself. Thank you. Thank you so much. Now, I think I may be able to forgive myself someday. I plan to continue wandering to stop others from repeating my mistake. I will stop them from harming others. Who know? They might call me a hero. Haha, nah that's foolishness. Hahaha! Y'know, I haven't laughed like this for a long time. Haha... Right, I should reward you for what you've done. Take this. This will help you. I've taken good care of it. Well then... Best I go. People in need won't just save themselves, right? 
<Reward for Fighters and Defenders><Reward for Archers and Rangers><Reward for Mage and Priests>
MsgIncomplete: I think he was weighed down by his own regret. I hope he breaks free of it someday.

MsgSummary: Eliminate at least 15 {c1}Lipiluss Security{/c} and report to {c2}Melissa Celina{/c}
MsgComplete: It's not as many as I'd like, but at least this can reduce the damage they can do.
MsgResponse1: This is quite surprising. I have heard from my sister of your valor... but you've gone above and beyond every expectation. Thank you.
MsgIncomplete: The work must be completed soon. I dislike unfinished things.

MsgSummary: Be rewarded by {c2}Melissa Celina{/c}.
MsgComplete:
Good job. Although perhaps that last task was a little too difficult for you. I'll try to assign you easier tasks at hand in the future. Anyway, thank you. Find the reward of your choosing. 
<Reward for Fighters and Defenders><Reward for Archers and Rangers><Reward for Mage and Priests>
MsgTake: Anyway, the job is done. Now comes the compensation. You failed to meet my expectations but it's important that you are paid for your services. Or am I wrong? Wait here for one second. I'll get the reward. The quality is good and you might find use for it soon. Don't worry. Talk to me when I'm back.

MsgSummary: Take at least 5 {c3}Diabolic Coal{/c} to {c2}Melissa Celina{/c}.
MsgComplete: I'm not so sure if a quality product can be made from the quantity provided... It's not as much as I'd prefer... but not so bad I can't use it. I'll have to get support.
MsgResponse1: You never disappoint me. Thank you so much. This is more than enough for my purposes.
MsgIncomplete: I have work to do, and so do you. We'll talk later when you come back.

MsgSummary: Be rewarded by {c2}Melissa Celina{/c}.
MsgComplete:
Good job. Although perhaps that last task was a little too difficult for you. I'll try to assign you easier tasks at hand in the future. Anyway, thank you. Find the reward of your choosing. 
<Reward for Fighters and Defenders><Reward for Archers and Rangers><Reward for Mage and Priests>
MsgTake: You've.. done a fabulous job.. I'll have to reward you. Don't worry since you'll be rewarded generously. my calculations are always correct. Anyway, I have selected a few things for you. Wait for a second and talk to me later. I'll go get your things.

MsgSummary: Take {c3}Self Designed Sword{/c} to {c2}Cyrus Bearwolf{/c}.
MsgIncomplete: This is your fault, I expect you to take full responsibility for your actions!

MsgSummary: Deliver the message (?) of {c2}Cyrus Bearwolf{/c} to {c2}Melissa Celina{/c}.
MsgIncomplete: I have fought many battles, seen empires crumble... But this time is different. I'm so nervous... It's rather funny if you think about it.

QuestName: Glory with the Union of Fury!
MsgSummary: Eliminate {c1}Flagrans Ides{/c} and {c1}Medius Ides{/c}
MsgComplete: Wow!! You have turned the battle situation to our advantage! On behalf of the Union of Fury, I thank and present {c2}Etin{/c}, the guild money. May you serve the Union of Fury continually and ever more.
MsgTake: Soldier! Won't you bring our Union of Fury victory? If only our mother and goddess, Etain could give us a hand, we may fight and eliminate those vile and cunning species. Soldier! Hope you win the battle with honor and courage!
MsgIncomplete: You're all members of the Union of Fury! The enemies fear us. Kill! Penetrate! They will fall to their knees!

MsgSummary: Eliminate {c1}Medius Altar{/c}.
MsgComplete: Oh dear... The time to destroy them is nigh. We reward you for your efforts on behalf of our government and the Union of Light with {c2}Etin{/c}, a form of guild coin. We look forward for your continual support.
MsgTake: Soldiers! We need your help to eliminate the vile and cruel Union of Fury. We need assistance for our country and the Union of Light. You may be aware that we are powerless to fight them. To win them, we need the power of Etain, the All-Mother and Goddess of Light. If Etain blesses us, we can eliminate all of the Union of Fury. To do so, they must be hindered. Please destroy the unholy relic that they possess. Help us.
MsgIncomplete: Heroes of the Union of Light! Eliminate all the foul beasts through our royal and righteous strength. Open your eyes, for victory is upon us!

MsgSummary: Take 5 {c2}Earth Alchemy Powder{/c}s to {c3}Steward Love Hon{/c}.
MsgTake: {c3}Catzbai Norktern{/c}, our master, rewards highly to those who bring him {c2}Earth Tear{/c}s. He loves {c2}Earth Tear{/c}s which are handmade from treated {c2}Earth Alchemy Powder{/c}. If you bring me 5 {c2}Earth Alchemy Powder{/c}s I will give you an {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c} which is known as a base for gemstone designing. I'll see you soon.
MsgIncomplete: Our master is very generous. He's good to his servants.

MsgSummary: Take 5 {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c} to {c3}Isaac Norktern{/c}.
MsgTake: My father is usually patient and generous but not when it comes to gemstones. To please him, I have learned alchemy on an expert level, same as my brothers. My father entrusts us with partial procedures of turning {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c} to {c2}Earth Tear{/c}. My work solely involves treating {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c} to increase light transmission. It's similar to a diamond cutting. Anyway... bring me 5 {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c} and I'll turn them to a {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c} which is the first step to an {c2}Earth Tear{/c}.
MsgIncomplete: We thank our father for the ability to study great arts such as these.

MsgSummary: Take 5 {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c}s to {c3}Killingtons Norktern{/c}.
MsgTake: My name is {c3}Killingtons Norktern{/c}. I'm Norktern's second son. I unify the {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c} into something special, you see, the minerals shine brilliantly when unified. I'm charge of this part of the process of making an {c2}Earth Tear{/c}. When I look at those lights. I'm in absolute awe. Its beauty can never be compared to anything else. Now then, bring me 5 {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c}s. I'll show you the most beautiful thing anyone has ever seen.
MsgIncomplete: Haha... though I'm enchanted with the glow of these things, it doesn't compare to the beauty of my family. My wife and kids are the most beautiful things that will last for a lifetime.

MsgSummary: Take 5 {c2}Light Core{/c}s to {c3}Kamia Norktern{/c}.
MsgTake: My name is {c3}Kamia Norktern{/c}. I'm the eldest in my family. People reckon my alchemy is the best among my siblings. It's true. I'm impressed with my work. My job is to treat the {c2}Light Core{/c} and turn it into a {c2}Star of Beauty{/c} which is the liquid state of an {c2}Earth Tear{/c}. Unlike other gemstones, {c2}Earth Tear{/c} has to gradually formed into a solid state that allows its gorgeous appearance to shine through. These phases may differ depending on the alchemist. Anyway, bring me 5 {c2}Light Core{/c}s. I'll help you be rewarded from my father.
MsgIncomplete: This mineral is very mysterious. You don't have to worry about cutting since this naturally fills up the bowl with light and makes its own just through alchemy treatment.

MsgSummary: Take 5 {c2}Stars of Beauty{/c} to {c3}Amukra Norktern{/c}.
MsgTake: Hello. My name is {c3}Amukra Norktern{/c}. I'm the master of the family and brother of {c3}Catzbai Norktern{/c}, teacher of the three brothers. My brother provided me with a roof over my head and stable retirement. In order to thank him, I'm assisting him with obtaining {c2}Earth Tear{/c}s. Bring me 5 {c2}Stars of Beauty{/c} and you can get an {c2}Earth Tear{/c} in return.
MsgIncomplete: If you are satisfied, brother.

MsgSummary: Be rewarded from {c3}Catzbai Norktern{/c}.
MsgComplete: Well.. This is {c2}Etin{/c}, useful when operating a guild. I have included around 1000 units. Hope this would suit you. Then, If you get another {c2}Earth Tear{/c} in the future. would you bring it? I'll reward you just as well.
MsgTake: Oh my... what's this?! How pure is this {c2}Earth Tear{/c}? You have some skills. Look at its glow.. Doesn't it look like millions of shooting stars combined into one brilliant stone? Beautiful... thank you so much. It's hard to find one so pure these days. This glimmer, this gorgeous sparkle. This can never be compared to any normal gemstone. You have brought me these, so I'll reward you. Talk to me once more. I'll get the stuff from storage.

MsgSummary: Collect 5 {c2}Earth Alchemy Powder{/c} and deliver to {c3}Ricardo{/c}.
MsgTake: Hello? I'm {c3}Ricardo{/c}, Nemiaga's assistant. I hold an important position at the Alchemist Association of the Union of Light. My master collects gemstones called {c2}Earth Tear{/c} that bear the light of another world. He believes that the gemstones would empower him. If you bring me 5 {c2}Earth Alchemy Powder{/c}, I will change this to {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c}.
MsgIncomplete: My master is very influential within the Union of Light.

MsgSummary: Collect 5 {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c} and deliver to {c3}Lupers Nemisis{/c}.
MsgTake: Hmm... Bring me the {c2}Earth Tear Ore{/c}... Your job... is only to bring them to me. Understood? Just bring them. I will... I will... I... will change them to a {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c}... I... I... I know how to perform alchemy.. Hmm... I'll be waiting...
MsgIncomplete: I'm scared of.. my fa... father..

MsgSummary: Collect 5 {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c} and deliver them to {c3}Latios Nemia{/c}.
MsgTake: Hmm.. from seeing those {c2}Light Filled Bowl{/c}s, you must have visited my autistic brother. This cutting method... My brother looks abnormal but outstand in practicing alchemy. If it wasn't for my father, we wouldn't have learned alchemy. I don't know why I'm doing this... Maybe, my job is to transform {c2}Light Filled Bowls{/c} into a {c2}Light Core{/c}. The process is so incredible. It gives a pleasing sight and I enjoy the work. So, bring 5 {c2}Light Filled Bowls{/c} and I will change them to a {c2}Light Core{/c}.
MsgIncomplete: If I knew that my fingernails were gonna be damaged from alchemy, I wouldn't have started in the first place.

MsgSummary: Collect 5 {c2}Light Core{/c} and deliver them to {c3}Oblician Criffort{/c}.
MsgTake: Hello. I'm {c3}Oblician Criffort{/c}, Nemiaga's 2nd senior alchemist. My master has great interest in the {c2}Earth Tear{/c} and so he hires and manages alchemists. My job is to change your {c2}Light Core{/c} into {c2}Star of Beauty{/c}. It's difficult process to turn light into a liquid, and thus our alchemists are paid quite highly. Anyway, bring me the material. About 5 is good.
MsgIncomplete: Profits are kept secret in our Nemia Alchemy Association. It's our rule.

MsgSummary: Collect 5 {c2}Star of Beauty{/c} and deliver them to {c3}Samuel Behimode{/c}.
MsgTake: Hello? I'm {c3}Samuel Behimode{/c}, Nemiaga's 1st senior alchemist. My job is to make the {c2}Earth Tears{/c}. If you bring me 5 {c2}Star of Beauty{/c} I'll change it into an {c2}Earth Tear{/c}. Well.. Bring me the items. I'm quite busy. I've got millions of things to do.
MsgIncomplete: I got a lot of things to do! Don't talk to me before you bring what you said you'd bring!

MsgSummary: Be rewarded from {c3}Amperis Nemia{/c}.
MsgTake: What an foolish pleeb, wanting to talk to me... I feel terrible. If you want to talk to me, you have only one option- Bring me a {c2}Earth Tear{/c} of perfect quality. That brightness, its clear light... not just the sheer beauty, but I believe there is something else other than that, a mystic power if you will. I want that power.. hehe... I talked too long with that fool. I must go... Mwahaha!!
MsgIncomplete: filthy worm. get lost.

MsgSummary: Collect the {c2}Pieces of King's Wrath Power{/c} scattered around Teos Epeiros.
MsgComplete:
You, mortal! My power, which has been harnessed through the king's wrath, is imperfect. Thus, it is not so easy for me to keep Teos Epeiros safe by myself. I want to give you the power. The power to save the world! 

Look and tell me! What is your most important wish? What do you want? Find the answer and talk to me. 






<I am a Fighter/Defender><I am a Ranger/Archer><I am a Mage/Priest>
MsgResponse1: Do you want the power? There are no second chances. I hope that you have no regrets.
MsgResponse2: Do you want the power? There are no second chances. I hope that you have no regrets.
MsgTake:
Do you know who stands before you now? I, {c0}Jeharr Teollema{/c} of the lower echelon dragon gods. 

I suppose that you know the situation of Teos Epeiros. {c1}Haruhion{/c} and {c1}Freezing Mirage{/c} left Etain and follow the outer god, the {c4}Cryptic One{/c}. Teos Epeiros is collapsing. I suppose that the defense of Teos Epeiros is weakening. 

When I first arrived here, six followers attacked me. I could have been destroyed before meeting the {c4}Cryptic One{/c}, but I killed them all. I used up all my energy to resist the outer god , succeeding in driving him near death. However, he had a hidden power which overpowered mine. 

Finally, I lost and my final power, the {c2}Power of King's Wrath{/c} was torn from my being. Soon after, the {c2}Power of King's Wrath{/c} was broken into many pieces and left in Teos Epeiros. It was a matter of time before I gave up and was captured. 

I gave up everything. I could not resist the evil god. However, you did it... you did what I thought was impossible. I cannot believe what I saw. How could you... Is this the secret power of your kind's survival? 

Mortal! I have lost all my powers to the {c4}Cryptic One{/c}! You must restore the {c2}Power of King's Wrath{/c} in order to bring me back to my true strength. Of course, it would take a long time. I need to recover as soon as possible, to keep Teos Epeiros... Mortal, I beseech you! Help me!
MsgIncomplete: This evil god will rise eternally unless I block  the dimensional tear. I was too hasty and caused this mess. It's all my fault.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c0}Zehar Teorema{/c}.
MsgComplete: <Destructive Power of a Tornado (Fighter)><Undestructable power of a Tower (Defender)>
MsgResponse1: I understood your answer, the crave for power.
MsgResponse2: Your search for power. I hope that you have no regrets.
MsgTake:
Is this your answer? The firmness of fire and earth. Requiring the destructive power of hell and firm like a stalwart mountain.. A weapon that can overcome the terror of an enemy unspoken...
Good... tell me. What is the strength you require? Tell me.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c0}Zehar Teorema{/c}.
MsgComplete: <Swift like the Wind (Ranger)><Precise like the Hawk (Archer)>
MsgTake:
Is this your answer? Sharp and quick like the wind... You require the strength of a tornado and the swift appearance of a sudden gust. A weapon fast as wind itself. 
Good.. Tell me what you want. What is the strength you require? Tell me.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c0}Zehar Teorema{/c}.
MsgComplete: <Turn Water into fire and let the Earth Sorche (Mage)><Bring Virtue to your friends and Punish your foes (Priest)>
MsgTake:
Is this your answer? Vitality and raging power like rolling rapids. You require the torrential fury like rolling roaring tidal wave. A weapon which allows Mana to be sensed around you and spun like a waterspout . 
Good... Tell me what you want. What is the strength you require? Tell me.

MsgSummary: Talk to the {c2}Random Dwarf{/c}.
MsgComplete: This piece completed the match. I exist anywhere. Find me...
MsgTake:
I suppose you have found me using that {c2}Piece of Magical Power{/c}. 

I cannot restore the original power of {c0}Jeharr Teollema{/c} with this. It is the power source of the dragon god. He is looking for it.

MsgSummary: Go to {c2}Doris{/c} in Stable Erde and check the story of the dragon's treasure.
MsgComplete: You aren't here for something? How can I help you?
MsgTake: Did you know that n the beginning of the world, the great dragon clan empowered their weapons with incredible magical power? Despite the many attempts from countless wizards and alchemists to discover the secret behind this imbuing process, they couldn't do it. However, I didn't give up. We explorers share information without the need to fight the two realms, Light and Fury. For sure it's difficult for me to go there with my ability. I have great knowledge but not blessed with fighting prowess. Go find him and bring me the information I seek.
MsgIncomplete: I lost contact with the last group that went to Stable Erde. Be careful.

MsgSummary: Capture 10 {c1}Lacerr`tier Curius {/c} and {c1} Lacerr`tier Herius {/c} respectively and report to Doris {/c}.
MsgComplete: That was pretty quick! Get the bodies before some other monsters show up. Ah, almost forgot about the information on the dragon clan's power. From what we know, it is from the items empowered with the abilities of the dragon clan. The chief of dragon clan, {c4}Tiamatt{/c}, the  god of the high echelon, empowered different beings with power equal to their own and used them to make weapons and armor in order to police against reckless use of magical power. This is all that I know. Sorry for my limited information. I reckon you better contact my friends in the Deep Desert. They have lived longer than I have. Try visiting Deep Desert 2. Now I gotta get to work! Bye!
MsgIncomplete: I don't care if you call me a coward for avoiding battle. We just don't like meaningless fights.

MsgSummary: Capture 8 {c1}Capsiwoo Sidork {/c} and {c1} Capsiwoo Laosha {/c} respectively and report to {c2} Janetris {/c}.
MsgComplete: Wow! You're good! You have eliminated a powerful spider with ease. Ah, the story is best known by {c2}Enteris{/c} at Deep Desert 1. The elders are old. They've sent the reply back to the wrong address. Anyway thank you!
MsgIncomplete: Damn spiders... they're so creepy with their freaky spindly legs and beady little eyes.

MsgSummary: Kill 10 {c1}Glare Scorpion {/c} and {c1}Glare Sand Hell Lion{/c} respectively and report to {c2}Eteris{/c}
MsgComplete:
Oh dear. What those girls told me weren't wrong! I'll then have to give you the information. The Dragons power. currently, it's hard to find the items with those powers in this land. Maybe it's because the dragon clan no longer exists here. However, recently, there was a method to find the items. It's the way where Keolloseu and Reikeuseu, the two dragons, were at. The items that they bore hold the power of the ancient dragon clan. 
You explorers are great. All our elders were surprised. Anyway, thank you on behalf of all our clan. We wanted peace. However, you have reached us first with a helping hand. Our clan must be so happy. If you come to the Deep Desert in the future, come see me. I'll try to deliver the goods you wish in a prompt manner. Haha!
MsgTake: Our elders are quite old. They certainly earn the name, but how could they mix up the address? Well, it wasn't sent to a wrong place exactly. I belong to one of the oldest races on this land. However I cannot help you for nothing. I heard a lot about you from {c2}Janetris{/c} and {c2}Doris{/c}. You must be really good what with hearing about how you killed crocodiles and spiders? To tell you the truth, scorpions and other pests are giving me problems. You gotta help me... Say, if you do the job I'll give you what you want. OK! I'll leave you to your task!
MsgIncomplete: They are filthy and so... so... ew!

MsgSummary: Eliminate {c1} Freezing Mirage {/c} and deliver its item to {c3} Kei {/c}.
MsgComplete:
Is this the item imbued with the dragon clan's power? Great! I can feel its great power just by holding it. Ah, didn't I mention that I have enough training and knowledge on par to a state licensed alchemist. So, let's see what we can do here. I need to analyze the item carefully. Here I go, just watch and learn.
{c5} The item started to shimmer, transforming into something else{/c}. 
By the goddess. this is great! I added just a little magical power to it. I didn't expect it to change this much. Well, This is for you! 
{c5} (You sure you give this to me? Wasn't it hard to get?) {/c}
It's alright. As I told you before, I'm not a fighter, I simply enjoy exploring and studying. This is a gift for someone who has done a lot for me. 
So, you want the solution to the last riddle? Try traveling with no regrets! Haha... See you later!

Are you saying that such an item is from that massive dragon? I was right! I knew that it's one of the dragon gods, but I wasn't too close to it to talk about the past. Anyway, the answer to this riddle is that powerful beast. I got to think for a second. 
Eureka! I have it! We need to find and bring back the item for further study. However, I am an explorer, not a monster killer. So, fighting is not one of my strong points. I'm counting on you to do this, what with me really busy and all. See you soon, Hero!

{c5} (You sure you give this to me? Wasn't it hard to get?) {/c}
It's alright. As I told you before, I'm not a fighter, I simply enjoy exploring and studying. This is a gift for someone who has done a lot for me. 
So, you want the solution to the last riddle? Try traveling with no regrets! Haha... See you later!
MsgTake:
Are you saying that such an item is from that massive dragon? I was right! I knew that it's one of the dragon gods, but I wasn't too close to it to talk about the past. Anyway, the answer to this riddle is that powerful beast. I got to think for a second. 
Eureka! I have it! We need to find and bring back the item for further study. However, I am an explorer, not a monster killer. So, fighting is not one of my strong points. I'm counting on you to do this, what with me really busy and all. See you soon, Hero!
MsgIncomplete: Heheh. I can't wait to see the results!

MsgSummary: Go to {c2}Doris{/c} in Stable Erde and check the story of the dragon's treasure.
MsgComplete: You aren't here for something? How can i help you?
MsgTake: Did you know that n the beginning of the world, the great dragon clan empowered their weapons with incredible magical power? Despite the many attempts from countless wizards and alchemists to discover the secret behind this imbuing process, they couldn't do it. However, I didn't give up. We explorers share information without the need to fight the two realms, Light and Fury. For sure it's difficult for me to go there with my ability. I have great knowledge but not blessed with fighting prowess. Go find him and bring me the information I seek.
MsgIncomplete: I lost contact with the last group that went to Stable Erde. Be careful.

MsgSummary: Capture 10 {c1}Lacerr'tier Curius{/c} and {c1}Lacerr'tier Herius{/c} respectively and report to Doris.
MsgComplete: That was pretty quick! Get the bodies before some other monsters show up. Ah, almost forgot about the information on the dragon clan's power. From what we know, it is from the items empowered with the abilities of the dragon clan. The chief of the dragon clan, {c4}Tiamatt{/c}, the god of the high echelon, empowered different beings with power equal to their own and used them to make weapons and armor in order to police against reckless use of magical power. This is all that I know. Sorry for my limited information. I reckon you better contact my friends in the Deep Desert. They have lived longer than I have. Try visiting Deep Desert 2. Now I gotta get to work! Bye!
MsgIncomplete: I don't care if you call me a coward for avoiding battle. We just don't like meaningless fights.

MsgSummary: Capture 8 {c1}Capsiwoo Sidork {/c} and {c1} Capsiwoo Laosha {/c} respectively and report to {c2} Janetris {/c}.
MsgComplete: Wow! You're good! You have eliminated a powerful spider with ease. Ah, the story is best known by {c2}Enteris{/c} at Deep Desert 1. The elders are old. They've sent the reply back to the wrong address. Anyway thank you!
MsgIncomplete: Damn spiders... they're so creepy with their freaky spindly legs and beady little eyes.

MsgSummary: Kill 10 {c1}Glare Scorpion {/c} and {c1}Glare Sand Hell Lion{/c} respectively and report to {c2}Eteris{/c}
MsgComplete:
Oh dear. What those girls told me weren't wrong! I'll then have to give you the information. The Dragons power. currently, it's hard to find the items with those powers in this land. Maybe it's because the dragon clan no longer exists here. However, recently, there was a method to find the items. It's the way where Keolloseu and Reikeuseu, the two dragons, were at. The items that they bore hold the power of the ancient dragon clan. 
You explorers are great. All our elders were surprised. Anyway, thank you on behalf of all our clan. We wanted peace. However, you have reached us first with a helping hand. Our clan must be so happy. If you come to the Deep Desert in the future, come see me. I'll try to deliver the goods you wish in a prompt manner. Haha!
MsgTake: Our elders are quite old. They certainly earn the name, but how could they mix up the address? Well, it wasn't sent to a wrong place exactly. I belong to one of the oldest races on this land. However I cannot help you for nothing. I heard a lot about you from {c2}Janetris{/c} and {c2}Doris{/c}. You must be really good what with hearing about how you killed crocodiles and spiders? To tell you the truth, scorpions and other pests are giving me problems. You gotta help me... Say, if you do the job I'll give you what you want. OK! I'll leave you to your task!
MsgIncomplete: They are filthy and so... so... ew!

MsgSummary: Eliminate {c1} Haru hion {/c} and deliver its item to {c3} Mondread {/c}.
MsgComplete:
Is this the item imbued with the dragon clan's power? Great! I can feel its great power just by holding it. Ah, didn't I mention that I have enough training and knowledge on par to a state licensed alchemist. So, let's see what we can do here. I need to analyze the item carefully. Here I go, just watch and learn.

MsgSummary: Information of quest : Find the missing {c2}Santa Troll{/c}!!
MsgComplete: Wha...? Who are you?
MsgTake:
Merry Christmas~
I'm so depressed, even though it's Christmas. I should have finished this Christmas tree days ago, 
but my schedule is all messed because of the santa troll brothers!  
They were supposed to help me finish the decorations and pass out gifts to the children, but they took off!
Please help me out!  If I stop the preperations to go look for them, nothing will get done around here... 
Can you do me a favor? Can look for them?
I'm pretty sure one of the Santa Troll boys is here! Go find him, please? 
Do this for me, and I'll make sure you don't coal in your stocking.
MsgIncomplete: Hey, no peeking! Wait, do you already know the gift?

MsgSummary: Find {c2}santa Troll's brother{/c} !!
MsgComplete: *sniff* *sniff*
MsgTake:
{c5}(The Santa Troll listens intently, then his eyes well up){/c}
Waaaaaaahhhh!  No!
I'm scared to go back!  I... I'm afraid of the Sexy Santa Woman!  She scares me with tinsle and cranberries!  
Doesn't she know that I'm allergic to cranberries?  She's so mean!
If my brothers came back, they could protect from the cranberries and the tinsle and the sparklies! Could you find my brothers?
If you find them, then I'll come back. I will, I promise.
MsgIncomplete: That woman is a monster. You might think I'm scary, but she is really scary! I'm afraid of her!

MsgSummary: Find {c2}Santa Troll's Other Brother{/c} !!
MsgComplete: Did you find my other brother? Is everything alright?
MsgTake:
{{c5}(The Santa Troll listens intently, then his eyes well up){/c}
Waaaaaaahhhh!  No!
I'm scared to go back!  I... I'm afraid of the Sexy Santa Woman!  She scares me with tinsle and cranberries!  
Doesn't she know that I'm allergic to cranberries?  She's so mean!
If my brothers came back, they could protect from the cranberries and the tinsle and the sparklies! Could you find my brothers?
If you find them, then I'll come back. I will, I promise.
MsgIncomplete: Ribbons and sparklies. I want a sparkly for my very own...

MsgSummary: Report your findings to the Festive {c2}Sexy Santa{/c} woman!
MsgComplete:
Oh...have you found the brothers?

{c5}(You relay all the stories you've heard){/c}
Aiee! What did they say?  I am not a slave driver!  Alleric to cranberries! pff!  What a lie! They should all be punished... 
But you did help, so I'll give the reward to you.  Your gift is... a {c3}Santa Hat{/c}! 
Show your holiday spirit by wearing this hat through to {c4}Jan 15th{/c}. 
Have a happy Christmas!
MsgIncomplete: Thank you.

MsgSummary: Find {c2}Santa Troll's Other Brother{/c} !!
MsgComplete: Did you find my other brother? Is everything alright?
MsgTake:
c5}(You relay the story from the festive Sexy Santa, and the tale of the first Santa Troll brother...){/c}
What? My brother told you that?  He's so skittish. Well, he *is* allergic to cranberries... So, I can see why he might be afraid of that woman. 
But we didn't run off!  She sent us on crazy errands.  She's so demanding.  Popcorn and pine boughs and ribbons and sparklies!  Like I can tie ribbons with these sausages for fingers! 
You know what?  Our eldest brother will know how to handle this. Please find him!  He'll help sort this out.
MsgIncomplete: Ribbons and sparklies. I want a sparkly for my very own...

MsgComplete:

Show your holiday spirit by wearing this hat through to {c4}Jan 15th{/c}. 
Have a happy Christmas!
MsgIncomplete: Thank you.

MsgSummary: {c2}Greendieta Cherubim{/c} is looking for mercenaries. Go find him. He is under the Ancient Tree Greendieta.
MsgComplete: You came here through the rumor? The Seraphim will know soon, too. You should hurry, strong soldier. Please be merciful to the Greendieta, and let me use your power.
MsgTake:
Haven't you heard the rumor? Okay. I will give you some info.

As you know, Greendieta is falling down because they turned traitor to both Light and Fury. Everything is getting worse now that they have enemies inside. 

You see, everybody knows that Cherubim wants to kill Seraphim. However, it will not be that easy becasue Cherubim is not strong enough to kill Seraphim yet. That is the reason why Cherubim is hiring mercenaries from both Light and Fury.

You should now go to {c2}Greendieta Cherubim{/c}. If you help him, you can get a treasure from Greendieta. I've lived in the borderlands for a long time and I know it's not easy to find something like that.
MsgWelcome: Haven't you found Cherubim yet? Go under the Ancient Tree Greendieta.
MsgIncomplete: Haven't you found Cherubim yet? Go under the Ancient Tree Greendieta.

MsgSummary: {c2}Greendieta Cherubim{/c} is looking for mercenaries. Go and find him. He is under the Ancient Tree Greendieta.
MsgComplete: You came here through the rumor? The Seraphim will know soon, too. You should hurry, strong soldier. Please be merciful to the Greendieta, and let me use your power.
MsgTake:
Haven't you heard the rumor? Okay. I will give you some info.

As you know, Greendieta is falling down because they turned traitor to both Light and Fury. Everything is getting worse now that they have enemies inside. 

You see, everybody knows that Cherubim wants to kill Seraphim. However, it will not be that easy becasue Cherubim is not strong enough to kill Seraphim yet. That is the reason why Cherubim is hiring mercenaries from both Light and Fury.

You should now go to {c2}Greendieta Cherubim{/c}. If you help him, you can get a treasure from Greendieta. I've lived in the borderlands for a long time and I know it's not easy to find something like that.
MsgWelcome: Haven't you found Cherubim yet? Go under the Ancient Tree Greendieta.

MsgSummary: Go to the dungeon of Caelum Greendieta, and get 10 {c3}Greendieta Souls{/c} from Caelum Greendietas. Bring them back to {c2}Cherubim{/c}. If you bring more, the reward is more.
MsgComplete:
You've got the Greendieta Soul at last. I feel that we'll have peace soon. However, we need more Souls. 

This is a reward for you. I have this item for you but I guess that is {c3}the best in D-Water Borderland{/c}. I wish you good luck.
MsgTake:
Seraphim has just started a war. It will bring destruction to Greendieta. To save Greendieta, we need to gather more strength. Go to the dungeon of Caelum Greendieta and get {c3}Greendieta Souls{/c} from Caelum Greendietas. It is the only power that makes Greendieta stronger.

I guess you hate us since we caused chaos to the borderlands. Please help me to stop this crisis. I will reward you with the most precious thing in Greendieta.
MsgIncomplete: Once Again!

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c}.
MsgComplete: Talk to {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c}.
MsgTake:
Welcome! I'm a Clerk to help you with the Auction House. For the beginner, I will explain everything about the Auction House step by step, so that you can learn how to use the Auction House easily.

The Auction House covers the entire continent. Light and Fury can buy from and sell to each other through the auctions. Your level doesn't matter when you buy something in an auction. So feel free to use the Auction House.

You can go to the Auction House through each city in Light and Fury. For Light, you can enter the Action House through {c1}Apulune{/c}, for Fury through {c1}Iris{/c}.

Now you can buy something through the auction. You can get more information from other clerks. I will give you a coupon. If you give this to other clerks, you can get a reward for it. Thanks for visiting me and as always, you are welcome to use our services. Have a good one.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c}.
MsgComplete: Hello! Do you have a coupon? Please show it to me. I will give a present for it.
MsgTake:
Do you like the reward? I will introduce myself. I'm an {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c} from the Vault Guild. You know where the Auction House is now, right?

The Vault Guild is found in the great {c4}Bootleggery{/c}. It is new guild that is has not sided with Light nor Fury. Most of the members of the guild are mutants or mixed blood which do not belong to any faction. Our society is capitalisic and the status can be changed by the money you have. 

Members of the Vault are weaker than any other tribe, so we hire mercenaries to protect ourselves. We are hiring mercenaries without considering where they are from or what they did in the past.

We are friendly to all people as long as they are not aggressive to us, so feel free to hang around this area. Thank you for listening and I'll give you a coupon. You can get a reward from other clerks after you talk with them. Have a good one!

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c}.
MsgComplete: Greetings. I am an {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c2}. I will reward you as long as you have coupons.
MsgTake:
Welcome! You got some information from the two other clerks, right? I also will give some information on how to use the Auction House. I'm going to introduce some of our members.

{c2}Vault Junior{/c} is the administrator of the Auction House. If you want to use the Auction House, you can do it through the notice board. We also have a nice bar around the Auction House, so you can drink special beer from the host. There are 2 more merchants. You can buy Auction House Soapstone and groceries from them. 

Is everything clear? It will be better to go and see for yourself. I will give you a coupon as a reward. If you give this to the last clerk, she will explain about the auction system and give a reward for that. Thank you and good luck.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Auctioneer Clerk{/c}.
MsgComplete: I am done explaining the Auction House. Thank you for listening to the Tutorial and as a token of appreciation, we will give you some gold as a reward. Enjoy your stay and good luck on your auctions.
MsgTake:
I'm sure that you have got some useful information from the other clerks. What I'm gonna tell you about is the auction sytem. It may be little bit difficult to understand. If you are new here, please read carefully.

You can use the auction system through the notice board.  Sellers can place items up for auction by setting a starting price as well as its duration. You can also set its buyout price. You can call for bids using the [bid] button. If you just want to buy for a buyout price, click the [buyout] button.

{c3}Sellers benefit from the auction, so we charge a fee from them.{/c}

Do you understand? We will provide the best service. Thank you.

MsgSummary: Go find {c2}Meilan Snowflower{/c}.
MsgComplete: What can I do for you?
MsgTake:
There is a lot of demand for mounts nowadays. However, it is not easy to tame animals like horses and leopards. I can't even sleep; how can I supply for all those demands?

I've heard that there is a master tamer named {c2}Meilan Snowflower{/c}. I wish I could get some useful tips for taming. However, I don't have enough time to go there as you see. Would you go there for me and get some information?

I will more than make up for your efforts. Maybe I can give a horse to you if the information is helpful. I hope you can get something from him.
MsgIncomplete: What a busy day!

MsgSummary: Send Meilan's messages to {c2}Heather Brunan{/c}
MsgComplete: What? Affection? Well, I don't have enough affection for it. I was too busy taking care of it. Thanks for your advice and the long trip for seeing me. Here is the reward for you.
MsgTake:
{c2}Heather Brunan{/c} is having a difficult time with this issue. I've got some information about taming since I've tamed wild boars and foxes in this area for a few years. During that time I had a lot of trouble with taming. Fortunately, it is actually not that hard to learn. 

Here is the secret. 
Humans and animals are all the same. Affection is the most powerful thing for taming. If you take care of them with love, they will follow you to the ends of the world. Isn't it too simple? Please convey to her that there is no better way than love.

{c5}Yes I will give your message to her{/c}
MsgIncomplete: Feel free to look around. There's a really nice view.

MsgSummary: Collect {c3}Criluph's heart, Amapo_Spool of 50,  Poison_Linz of 10, {/c}, and give them to {c2}Heather Brunan.
MsgComplete: Wow! You are incredible! It was worth the wait. I guess he was probably too wild to hunt down. Did you get hurt? No? That's nice. I'm so happy that you killed him.
MsgTake:
Good to see you again. The tips for taming were very useful. I really appreciate that. Well, acutally, I have a problem. There is a special and unique ram called {c3}Criluph{/c}. 

It often shows up near StoneHammer villa. It ran away while I was taming. It is too wild to tame so I just want to get its heart as a present to my old friend. Could you get the {c3}Criluph's heart{/c} for me?

{c5} It will be not easy, but I want you to try.{/c}

Thank you. I bet you can do it.
MsgIncomplete: What are you doing here? I thought you would be fighting against Criluph by now. Are you afraid of him?

QuestName: Stuff that is easy to get(1)
MsgSummary: Give {c3}Stuff list of Necessaries{/c} to {c2}Ezella{/c}
MsgComplete: Greetings, oh, she sent the List of Necessities. In this world, it's really hard to find a merchant who has as many goods as she has.
MsgIncomplete: It will be not that hard, right?

QuestName: Stuff that is easy to get(2)
MsgSummary: Buy {c3}Lans Fruit of 20, Venom Cure Potion of 10, Holy Potion of 5, and give them to {c2}Heather Brunan.
MsgComplete: Oh, you came back. Now I can make the present to send to my friend. Crafting needs a lot of effort. You know that, right?
MsgTake:
Are you going to buy all these things now?

There are 20 {c3}Lans Fruit{/c}, 10 {c3}Venom Cure Potion{/c},  and 5 {c3}Holy Potion{/c} in the list. I sell them all, so you can just buy them. If you buy them in bulk, I'll give you a discount on those.

You can also use this stuff when you hunt. Come on!
MsgIncomplete: I'm selling the best stuff.

MsgSummary: Kill each {c1}Fedion Leopardess ???, Fedion Leopardess ??? of 30{/c} and report to {c2}Heather Brunan{/c}
MsgComplete: They aren't going to cause troubles for a while. Thats a positive note.
MsgTake:
I made it finally! I'm really happy that I can do something for my friend. Now all I have to do is figure out how to send this safely. I've heard that there are some dangerous creatures on the way to my friend. I think It will be good if you kill them before I send this.

There are in the Fedion area. Well, I can't remember the name of them. Let me think. Oh they are {c1}Fedion Leopardess Hunter{/c}, 30 {c1}Fedion Leopardess Chaser{/c}. Good luck!
MsgIncomplete: They are annoying. Please kill them all.

MsgSummary: Send {c3}Heart filled Gift{/c} to Kenneth
MsgTake:
This is the {c3}Heart filled Gift{/c} for Kenneth. Take it. Please be careful while you are taking it to him. 

Kenneth lives in the vineyard of Fedion. He is my old pal, but I haven't seen him for a long time. He sent lots of fruits from his farm last Thanksgiving Day. I didn't have a chance to thank him for that. Could you send him my message with my present?

{c5}Yes. I will{/c}

Thank you so much. I really appreciate it. I guess this is the last task I will ask of you. I'll give you something nice when you come back.
MsgIncomplete: Be careful!

MsgSummary: Take Kenneth's message to {c2}Heather Brunan{/2}
MsgComplete:
You are finally here. I've waited for you to come all day long. I'll give something precious as I promised you. Here is the mount for your present. 

Now you can go somewhere much faster than before. It's really expensive but I'll give it to you for free. 
<Human><Elf>
MsgIncomplete: Busy, busy...

MsgSummary: Go find {c2}Cfaina Deiat{/c} and talke with her
MsgTake:
I've gotten a message from {c2}Cfaina Deiat{/c} of Fotamion Watch Tower. She is urgently looking for someone that can help her. 

I don't know about the details, but It seems really pressing. I wish I could go there and figure out what's going on, but I'm not available as you see. She makes and sells weapons in a battlefront. I really respect her for that. Please, treat her with respect.

We don't have much time. Please hurry.
MsgIncomplete: I told you it's urgent. Hurry up!

MsgSummary: Talk with {c2}Taceho Raksion{/c} about Cfaina Deiat's favor.
MsgComplete: What did you bring? Tell me about it.
MsgIncomplete: I have so much to do. I am so tired.

QuestName: Materials for a luxury horse saddle
MsgSummary: Collect {c3}Ghostwolf's fur{/c}, 50 of {c3}Amapo Spool{/c}, 30 of {c3}Poison Linz{/c}, and take it to Taceho Raksion.
MsgComplete: You are a amazing expert! How does Ghostwolf look like? Does it have scary canine teeth as I told you?
MsgIncomplete: Don't hesitate friend. Go and get him!

MsgSummary: give {c3}Stuff list of Necessaries{/c} to Testis
MsgComplete: Welcome. What can I do for you? Oh Taceho asked for materials for a horse saddle, right?
MsgTake:
Now, I can start making the saddle. Thank you. Let's check the list before we start. 

50 Amapo Spool and 30 Poison Linz. Oh!! I forgot about something. I didn't get the stuff that I asked Testis for. I need adhesive to put these things together. Can you take this {c3}List of Necessities{/c} to Testis, the potion seller?
MsgIncomplete: We don't have much time. You should hurry. It won't be tough.

MsgSummary: Get {c3}Lans Fruit of 20, Venom Cure Potion of 10, Holy Potion of 5{/c} from merchants and bring them to Taceho Raksion.
MsgComplete: I wish I could do that favor but I don't have enough time to do it. Well, everything is ready now. Thanks for your effort.
MsgTake:
Oh! I have all the stuff you need.

{c5}That's nice.{/c}

These are materials for making adhesive. Is he making saddles? He seems nice, but I didn't have a chance to talk with him as he is always busy with making something. Could you tell him that I want to hang out with him someday after his work is done?

Here you are.
MsgIncomplete: May I help you?

MsgSummary: Kill {c1}30 of Kapentiel Protection Bottle, 30 of SilverPick Goblin Incantation company{/c} and report to Taceho Raksion
MsgComplete: How was it? Are they easy to slaughter? I had a huge headache because of them. Well done.
MsgIncomplete: What are you doing now? You said it's a piece of cake.

MsgSummary: Bring {c3}Luxury saddle{/c} to Voff
MsgComplete:
Greetings! HawHaw! 
Can I see that luxury stuff?
MsgTake:
I'm sorry but the schedule has been changed little bit. The Commander of the Deatheaters will go to the Aumeros Amy Port without stopping by the Fotamion Watch Tower. Please bring this to Voff in Aumeros Amy port.

It will be not be tough to go there. I will pay you when you come back.
MsgIncomplete: I hope you will deliver the saddle safely.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Taceho Raksion{/c}
MsgComplete:
Did you finish your job well?

{c5}It is delivered in one piece{/c}

That's good. It was hard to do other things because of it. All the merchants can sell stuff here safely because he protect us.

Cfaina sent some money for you and I'll give you something too. That is.....
a horse you can ride. It will be much more convenient for your journey.

<Vail><Deatheater>
MsgTake: This is really the best. It looks so beautiful. I guess the commander will like it too. He just changed his schedule and even we didn't expect he would come sooner. Please give my regards and thanks to him. Our tribe is much stronger than we thought. We will win the war.
MsgIncomplete: I'll keep this in a safe place. Don't worry about that.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Astiz{/c}.
MsgComplete: I see you've made up your mind. Let's gather our forces and sweep those rebels out!
MsgTake:
Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c} and I'm in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim. I've heard that you helped suppress the rebel armies in Greendieta. They are weak now, so it's time to clean out those bastards.   
We got information that {c2}Agherus{/c}, the captain of the rebels, has escaped to Caelum Sacra. They're out of room to run now, so the last battle against them will be tough. If you want to join this war, then let me know after you've made up your mind.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: There's no time to waste.
MsgResponse4: There's no time to waste.

MsgSummary: Kill 50 {c1}Sacra Thrones{/c}.
MsgComplete: Well, now!  You've come back! Take this. It will help you in the battles ahead.
MsgTake: There's an unidentified barrier in front of the entrance to Caelum Sacra. We think the barrier only blocks the Greendieta locals, so you should be able to enter without any problems. Please go there and kill 50 {c1}Sacra Thrones{/c}to weaken the barrier.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Good luck.
MsgResponse4: Good luck.

MsgSummary: Kill 50 {c1}Sacra Archangels{/c}.
MsgComplete: Well done.
MsgTake: I feel the Seraphims' power getting weaker...  Now, go to the second room and kill 50{c1}Sacra Archangels{/c}. Take this as well - it ought to be of aid to you.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Good luck.
MsgResponse4: Good luck.

MsgSummary: Kill 50{c1}Sacra Dominions{/c}.
MsgComplete: Well done.
MsgTake: Now, this is the last push. I can almost see Agherus now. Go and kill 50 {c1}Sacra Dominions{/c}!!
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Good luck.
MsgResponse4: Good luck.

MsgSummary: Kill the guardians in Sacra and take the Caelum Crystal!
MsgComplete: I'm so pleased to have you here.  We're ready at last.
MsgTake: Now we can take them all out! However, they have a Caelum Crystal in the middle of Caelum Sacra that can restore the barrier again. If we get that crystal, Agherus will lose his power. Kill the guardians and bring the crystal here.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Good luck.
MsgResponse4: Good luck.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c1}Astiz{/c} and find {c1}Agherus{/c} in Caelum Sacra.
MsgComplete: Are you a soldier of... {c2}Astiz{/c}? Well, you came to the wrong place. That was me who summoned the insurrection in Greendieta.  I was out of my mind back then. {c1}Dios Exiel{/c} brainwashed me. He told me that he would give me victory and the spoils. I followed him. I know that was my fault, but he gave me a mystical drug, and I couldn't control myself. Now I've woken up here, only to see that everything was destroyed. The Cherubim don't know my side of the story.
MsgTake: Now the only thing to do is to find Agherus and kill him. Only then will all of this be over. You can find him on the first floor of Sacra.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am in charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: He may still have his power. Be careful.
MsgResponse4: Uh... (He has a pained look on his face.)

MsgSummary: Talk to {c1}Agherus{/c} and tell his story to {c1}Astiz{/c}.
MsgComplete: Welcome back. Hmm...what's with that look on your face? Is there something wrong?
MsgTake: I wanted to tell this story to Astiz, but he wouldn't believe me. Please, tell him this story and help him believe my words.
MsgWelcome: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)
MsgIncomplete: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)
MsgResponse4: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)

MsgSummary: Find {c1}Dios Exiel{/c} on second floor of Caelum Sacra and kill him.
MsgComplete: Welcome back. We owe you a great debt. Now, the highest department is trying to solve this situation.
MsgTake: What did he say? {c2}Agherus{/c} was brainwashed? Tell me more about that....Ah...my impetuousness may bring this horrible situation to Greendieta. I've know Agherus for a long time. I...I should have known! Please, seek out Exiel and kill him. I have to go to high governor and bring a stop to this useless war against the Seraphim.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I am taking a charge of army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Please. I have to go meet with the high governor.
MsgResponse4: Please. I have to go meet with the high governor.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Astiz{/c}
MsgComplete: I hope you can use this the right way.
MsgTake: Now, through your hardships and efforts, Caelum shall know peace. That {c1}Dios Exiel{/c} tried to remove our Caelum from Teos Epeiros. Your work was truly commendable. I know this is not a huge reward, but please take these. You can find this kind of metal and crystal only in Greendieta. I've heard this crystal can bestow an elemental power. Take this Adamantium and crystal and find a blacksmith in one of the big cities.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Astiz{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Please, accept this. I only wish I could give you something of greater value than these.

MsgTake:
Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}, and I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim. I've heard that you helped to suppress the rebel armies in Greendieta. Now that they've been weakened, the time is ripe to root out those bastards. 
We've received information that {c2}Agherus{/c}, the captain of the rebels, has taken up a position within Caelum Sacra. They have no choices now, so I'm sure they'll put up a tough fight. If you want to join this war, let me know when you've made up your mind.

MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.

MsgIncomplete: Good luck.

MsgComplete: Well done.

MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Good luck.
MsgResponse4: Good luck.

MsgSummary: Kill guardians in Sacra and take the Caelum's Crystal.
MsgComplete: I'm pleased you could join us. Now we look toward the last of these engagements...
MsgTake: Now we can take them all out! But they have a Caelum Crystal in the center who can restore the barrier again. If we get that crystal, Agherus will lose his power. Now, kill the guardians and bring the crystal here.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Good luck.
MsgResponse4: Good luck.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c1}Irsian{/c} and find {c1}Agherus{/c} in Caelum Sacra.
MsgComplete: Are you a soldier of {c2}Irsian{/c}? Well, you got one thing wrong. It was indeed me who raised the insurrection in Greendieta, but at that time, I was not in my right mind. {c1}Dios Exiel{/c} brainwashed me and instilled me with new beliefs. He told me that he would grant me victory, and all the rewards beyond victory - and I followed him. I am not trying to escape blame, but he did inject me with a powerful drug, and I couldn't control myself. Now I've awakened here, only to see all that has been destroyed. The Cherubim people...they have no idea that this is the truth.
MsgTake: Now, all that is left is to find Agherus. Kill him, and then all of this will be ended. You can find him on the first floor of Sacra.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: He may yet retain much of his power. Be careful.
MsgResponse4: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)

MsgSummary: Talk to {c1}Agherus{/c} and tell his story to {c1}Irsian{/c}.
MsgComplete: Welcome back. Hm...that look on your face...is there something wrong?
MsgTake: I wanted to tell this story to Astiz, but he wouldn't believe me. Please, convey my words to him.
MsgWelcome: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)
MsgIncomplete: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)
MsgResponse4: Uh..... (He has a pained look on his face.)

MsgSummary: Find {c1}Dios Exiel{/c} on the second floor of Caelum Sacra and kill him.
MsgComplete: Welcome back. We owe you a great deal. Now, the highest department is trying to solve this situation.
MsgTake: What did he say? {c2}Agherus{/c} was brainwashed? Tell me more about that....Ah...my impetuousness may bring this horrible situation to Greendieta. I've know Agherus for a long time. I...I should have known! Please, seek out Exiel and kill him. I have to go to high governor and bring a stop to this useless war against the Seraphim.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Please. I have to go meet with the high governor.
MsgResponse4: Please. I have to go meet with the high governor.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Irsian{/c}
MsgComplete: I hope you can use this the right way.
MsgTake: Now, through your hardships and efforts, Caelum shall know peace. That {c1}Dios Exiel{/c} tried to remove our Caelum from Teos Epeiros. Your work was truly commendable. I know this is not a huge reward, but please take these. You can find this kind of metal and crystal only in Greendieta. I've heard this crystal can bestow an elemental power. Take this Adamantium and crystal and find a blacksmith in one of the big cities.
MsgWelcome: Hello. I'm {c2}Irsian{/c}. I'm taking charge of the army in Greendieta Cherubim.
MsgIncomplete: Please, accept this. I only wish I could give you something of greater value than these.
MsgResponse4: Please, accept this. I only wish I could give you something of greater value than these.

MsgSummary: Find {c2}Alius Magicartisan{/c}
MsgComplete: Hey, it's been a long time. What brings you here?
MsgTake:
Caelum Crystal and Adamantium...
Well, I'm sorry to say, but I don't know much about that. I just heard you can make powerful weapons with these things. They're special resources, only able to be found in Caelum. Alius may know something about this.
MsgWelcome:
Do you have a Lapis?
Ah, I'm generally regarded as a deft hand at weapon restoration. Give it to me for a bit.
MsgIncomplete: Alius may know about the secrets of crafting Adamantium.

MsgSummary: Buy an Elemental Item Recipe from {c2}Iverinne Melos{/c} in the capital city and give it to Alius.
MsgComplete: Do you think you wasted your money? Well, you won't regret it - I guarantee it!
MsgTake: Compounding Caelum crystal and Adamantium? Hm...I've seen recipes of this sort before. If you bring the manual, then I'll do my best. But that manual contains valuable information, so I'm betting it'll be pretty expensive.
MsgWelcome: For us to work together, respect is the key element.
MsgIncomplete: You can get it in the capital city.
MsgResponse4: You can get it in the capital city.

MsgSummary: Take the Recipe from {c2}Alius{/c} and give it to {c2}Alicia Lopez{/c}.
MsgComplete: You have an Elemental Item Recipe?
MsgTake:
(Still reading the explanation.)
Hold on, this is complicated stuff!
(He scans the material once more.) 
Ah ha! I've got it! I'll write down a new explanation and you can take that document to Alicia Lopez. I hope you'll soon be the proud owner of a new weapon.
MsgWelcome: For us to work together, respect is the key element.
MsgIncomplete: I hope you'll soon be the proud owner of a new weapon.
MsgResponse4:
Do you have a Lapis?
Ah, I'm generally regarded as a deft hand at weapon restoration. Give it to me for a bit.

MsgSummary: Talk to {c2}Alicia Lopez{/c}.
MsgComplete:
Ah, you have an elemental stone AND a recipe! That's a rarity. Alright, be sure to choose a weapon suited to your class.
<Fighter><Defender>
MsgResponse1: Ah, you have an elemental stone AND a recipe! That's a rarity. Alright, be sure to choose a weapon suited to your class.
MsgTake: If you have a Recipe, then I can do it for you. Show me your Adamantium and Caelum's Crystal.
MsgWelcome:
Do you have a Lapis?
Ah, I'm generally regarded as a deft hand at weapon restoration. Give it to me for a bit.

MsgSummary: Find {c2}Palbatus{/c}
MsgComplete: Hey, It's been a long time. What brings you here?
MsgTake:
Caelum Crystal and Adamantium...
Well, I'm sorry to say but I don't know much about that. I just heard you can make a weapon with these things. Problem is, they are quite rare and can be found only in Caelum. Palbatus may know something about this.
MsgWelcome: I can't help you with this.
MsgIncomplete: Palbatus may know about the Adamantium craft.

MsgSummary: Buy the Recipe of Elemental Items from {c2}Partim{/c} in the capital city and give it to Palbatus.
MsgComplete: Do you think you wasted your money? Haha, you won't regret it.
MsgTake: Compounding of Caelum crystal and Adamantium? Hm...I've seen the Recipe of this kind. If you bring the manual then I will do my best. But that manual has valuable information so it will be very expensive.
MsgWelcome: I won't do this thing anymore.
MsgIncomplete: You can get it in capital city.
MsgResponse4: You can get it in capital city.

MsgSummary: Take Recipe from {c2}Palbatus{/c} and give it to {c2}Ferrum{/c}.
MsgComplete: You have a Recipe of Elemental item.
MsgTake:
(Still reading a explanation.)
Hold on, it's little bit complicated.
(Reading again.) 
Ah ha! Now I remember! Let me jot down a new recipe for you to bring to Ferrum. I hope you can have a new shining weapon.
MsgWelcome: I won't do this thing anymore.
MsgIncomplete: I hope you can have a new shiny weapon when you're done.
MsgResponse4:
Do you have a lapis?
Ah, just weapon restoration is okay for me. Give it to me.
